Create the Review on the ClubJudge.

Example

Creates a new review for venue 221.

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d \ '{ "type": "VenueReview", "targetId": 221, "title": "Awesome Place to party!!", "positiveComments": "The environment is awesome!", "negativeComments": "Hard to enter!", "scores": { "pricing": 10, "location": 0, "atmosphere": 5, "safety": 1, "service": 10, "musicAndLineup": 10 } }' \ https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/reviews.json?token=userToken
